name: content-engagement-analyzer
description: Inspired by @Jonasackerman00's guide on mastering attention in writing (https://x.com/Jonasackerman00/status/1749470098027323578). Paste any content — blog post, newsletter, social post, landing page copy — and get a detailed engagement analysis across 6 dimensions: hook strength, structure, sentence energy, specificity, emotional triggers, and call-to-action. Every critique quotes your actual text and includes specific rewrites you can use immediately.

content.description: The content to analyze for engagement. Paste the full text of your blog post, newsletter, social post, landing page copy, or any written content.

content_type.description: What type of content is this? Helps calibrate expectations — a technical doc has different engagement needs than a tweet thread.

target_audience.description: Who is this content for? Helps judge whether the tone and hooks are appropriate for the intended readers.

analysis.description: Full engagement analysis covering all 6 dimensions with quoted text and rewrites

hook_score.description: How well the opening grabs attention

structure_score.description: How scannable and well-organized the content is

sentence_energy_score.description: Active voice, varied rhythm, no flabby writing

specificity_score.description: Concrete details and proof vs. vague claims

emotional_triggers_score.description: Does the content make the reader feel something

cta_score.description: Clear payoff and next step for the reader

verdict.description: One sentence summarizing the content's engagement quality

top_3_fixes.description: The 3 highest-impact changes with specific rewrite examples
